title: CellRanger ATAC
name: cellranger-atac
description: The computational pipeline for processing the data produced from the Chromium Single Cell ATAC Solution

title: CellRanger Aggr
name: cellranger-aggr
description: Pool results of CellRanger Count into aggregated matrix.

title: CellRanger Count
name: cellranger-count
description: CellRanger Count uses STAR to align sequences to genome, and subsequently alignes exonic sequences to the transcriptome. UMIs are corrected for sequencing errors and uniqued, and cell are called using EmptyDrops.
